name: War in Poland
description: 17th of september, 1939, USSR forces attacked Poland annexing its eastern part. War in Poland is an pixel art arcade game in which we lead the fate of a young polish soldier. Our objective is to pass 3 different missions and kill all enemies on the map. Project has been created by a small development studio that has just started its adventure with gamedev, it is our first training-project. I invite everyone to check out and play. FACEBOOK : https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100087920754926
